channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubiquiti Networks -- EdgeRouter X
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubiquiti Networks -- EdgeRouter X

item.title: CVE-2017-0932|2024-08-05T13:25:17.095Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgerouter%20x
item.description: Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1.1 and prior suffer from an Improper Privilege Management vulnerability due to the lack of validation on the input of the Feature functionality. An attacker with access to an operator (read-only) account and ssh connection to the devices could escalate privileges to admin (root) access in the system.

item.title: CVE-2017-0934|2024-08-05T13:25:17.084Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgerouter%20x
item.description: Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1 and prior suffer from an Improper Privilege Management vulnerability due to the lack of protection of the file system leading to sensitive information being exposed. An attacker with access to an operator (read-only) account could escalate privileges to admin (root) access in the system.

item.title: CVE-2017-0933|2024-08-05T13:25:16.864Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgerouter%20x
item.description: Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1 and prior suffer from a Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability. An attacker with access to an operator (read-only) account could lure an admin (root) user to access the attacker-controlled page, allowing the attacker to gain admin privileges in the system.

item.title: CVE-2017-0935|2024-08-05T13:25:17.246Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgerouter%20x
item.description: Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1.1 and prior suffer from an Improper Privilege Management vulnerability due to the lack of protection of the file system leading to sensitive information being exposed. An attacker with access to an operator (read-only) account could escalate privileges to admin (root) access in the system.
